content: spiral ruffled scrunchie designed by mimi santiago alelis © 2006 http //mimi csa googlepages com/spiralruffledscrunchie pdf skill level easy materials cannon size 8 thread shown on the left or anchor size 10 thread shown on the right cannon sc034 and anchor kam16 used in this project inox crochet hook size 2 5 mm u s equivalent b-1 hair elastic goody ouchless elastics used in this project yarn needle for weaving ends gauge not important abbreviations chain = chain slip_stitch = slip_stitch single_crochet = single_crochet st = stitch round = round attach the thread to the elastic with a knot round 1 chain 6 counts as first loop * turn the loop around the elastic from back to front passing through inner circle of elastic remove hook from loop and bring the hook on top and pick up the loop again on the right side slip_stitch on the elastic chain 5 repeat from * around approx 45 times or until elastic is fairly covered join to 1st chain at the beginning of round round 2 *single_crochet in loop chain 3 single_crochet 8 times in same loop keeping the loop on hook turn the hook around elastic in same manner as in round 1 pick up the loop on the right side repeat from * on each loop around join to the 1st single_crochet fasten_off and weave in ends http //mimi csa googlepages com/
